description: Enables you to programmatically delete an Amazon Web Services Supply Chain data lake dataset. Developers can delete the existing datasets for a given instance ID, namespace, and instance name.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The AWS Supply Chain instance identifier.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the dataset, besides the custom defined namespace, every instance comes with below pre-defined namespaces: asc - For information on the Amazon Web Services Supply Chain supported datasets see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/aws-supply-chain/latest/userguide/data-model-asc.html. default - For datasets with custom user-defined schemas.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. For asc namespace, the name must be one of the supported data entities under https://docs.aws.amazon.com/aws-supply-chain/latest/userguide/data-model-asc.html.

nested_items.name: instanceId
nested_items.description: The AWS Supply Chain instance identifier.
